content.question: A region in the plane is bounded by the graph of y = 1/x , the x-axis, the line x = m, and the line x = 2m, m > 0. The area of this region

choices.label: decreases as m increases when m < 1/2 ; increases as m increases when m > 1/2.
increases as m increases when m < 1/2 ; decreases as m increases when m >1/2.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
